verses.verse: וַיַּ֨עַל <WH5927> went up מֹשֶׁ֜ה <WH4872> And Moses מֵֽעַרְבֹ֤ת <WH6160> from the plains מוֹאָב֙ <WH4124> of Moab אֶל־ <WH413> to הַ֣ר <WH2022> unto the mountain נְב֔וֹ <WH5015> of Nebo רֹ֚אשׁ <WH7218> to the top הַפִּסְגָּ֔ה <WH6449> of Pisgah אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> that פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> that [is] over against יְרֵח֑וֹ <WH3405> Jericho וַיַּרְאֵ֨הוּ <WH7200> shewed יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאָ֛רֶץ <WH776> him all the land אֶת־ <WH853> הַגִּלְעָ֖ד <WH1568> of Gilead עַד־ <WH5704> far דָּֽן׃ <WH1835> unto Dan

וְאֵת֙ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all נַפְתָּלִ֔י <WH5321> And all Naphtali וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> and the land אֶפְרַ֖יִם <WH669> of Ephraim וּמְנַשֶּׁ֑ה <WH4519> and Manasseh וְאֵת֙ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> and all the land יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah עַ֖ד <WH5704> far הַיָּ֥ם <WH3220> sea הָאַחֲרֽוֹן׃ <WH314> unto the utmost

וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַנֶּ֗גֶב <WH5045> And the south וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> הַכִּכָּ֞ר <WH3603> and the plain בִּקְעַ֧ת <WH1237> of the valley יְרֵח֛וֹ <WH3405> of Jericho עִ֥יר <WH5892> the city הַתְּמָרִ֖ים <WH8558> of palm עַד־ <WH5704> far צֹֽעַר׃ <WH6820> unto Zoar

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> about זֹ֤את <WH2063> likewise הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> unto him This [is] the land אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which נִ֠שְׁבַּעְתִּי <WH7650> which I sware לְאַבְרָהָ֨ם <WH85> unto Abraham לְיִצְחָ֤ק <WH3327> unto Isaac וּֽלְיַעֲקֹב֙ <WH3290> and unto Jacob לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying לְזַרְעֲךָ֖ <WH2233> it unto thy seed אֶתְּנֶ֑נָּה <WH5414> I will give הֶרְאִיתִ֣יךָ <WH7200> I have caused thee to see בְעֵינֶ֔יךָ <WH5869> [it] with thine eyes וְשָׁ֖מָּה <WH8033> there לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תַעֲבֹֽר׃ <WH5674> but thou shalt not go over

וַיָּ֨מָת <WH4191> died שָׁ֜ם <WH8033> there מֹשֶׁ֧ה <WH4872> So Moses עֶֽבֶד־ <WH5650> the servant יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> there in the land מוֹאָ֖ב <WH4124> of Moab עַל־ <WH5921> according פִּ֥י <WH6310> according to the word יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַיִּקְבֹּ֨ר <WH6912> And he buried אֹת֤וֹ <WH853> בַגַּיְ֙ <WH1516> him in a valley בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> of Moab מ֖וּל <WH4136> over against בֵּ֣ית פְּע֑וֹר <WH1047> Bethpeor וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> no יָדַ֥ע <WH3045> knoweth אִישׁ֙ <WH376> but no man אֶת־ <WH853> קְבֻ֣רָת֔וֹ <WH6900> of his sepulchre עַ֖ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this

וּמֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> And Moses בֶּן־ <WH1121> old מֵאָ֧ה <WH3967> [was] an hundred וְעֶשְׂרִ֛ים <WH6242> and twenty שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> years בְּמֹת֑וֹ <WH4194> when he died לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor כָהֲתָ֥ה <WH3543> was not dim עֵינ֖וֹ <WH5869> his eye וְלֹא־ <WH3808> nor נָ֥ס <WH5127> abated לֵחֹֽה׃ <WH3893> nor his natural force

וַיִּבְכּוּ֩ <WH1058> wept בְנֵ֨י <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֧ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> for Moses בְּעַֽרְבֹ֥ת <WH6160> in the plains מוֹאָ֖ב <WH4124> of Moab שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <WH7970> thirty י֑וֹם <WH3117> days וַֽיִּתְּמ֔וּ <WH8552> were ended יְמֵ֥י <WH3117> so the days בְכִ֖י <WH1065> of weeping אֵ֥בֶל <WH60> [and] mourning מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> for Moses

וִֽיהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ <WH3091> And Joshua בִּן־ <WH1121> the son נ֗וּן <WH5126> of Nun מָלֵא֙ <WH4392> was full ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> of the spirit חָכְמָ֔ה <WH2451> of wisdom כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for סָמַ֥ךְ <WH5564> had laid מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> for Moses אֶת־ <WH853> יָדָ֖יו <WH3027> his hands עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> and וַיִּשְׁמְע֨וּ <WH8085> hearkened אֵלָ֤יו <WH413> on בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> upon him and the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֔וּ <WH6213> unto him and did כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> as the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> Moses

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> no קָ֨ם <WH6965> And there arose נָבִ֥יא <WH5030> not a prophet ע֛וֹד <WH5750> since בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> in Israel כְּמֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> like unto Moses אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> whom יְדָע֣וֹ <WH3045> knew יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God פָּנִ֖ים <WH6440> face אֶל־ <WH413> to פָּנִֽים׃ <WH6440> to face

לְכָל־ <WH3605> for all הָ֨אֹת֜וֹת <WH226> In all the signs וְהַמּוֹפְתִ֗ים <WH4159> and the wonders אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which שְׁלָחוֹ֙ <WH7971> sent יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> which the LORD לַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <WH6213> him to do בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt לְפַרְעֹ֥ה <WH6547> to Pharaoh וּלְכָל־ <WH3605> all עֲבָדָ֖יו <WH5650> and to all his servants וּלְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אַרְצֽוֹ׃ <WH776> and to all his land

וּלְכֹל֙ <WH3605> and for all הַיָּ֣ד <WH3027> hand הַחֲזָקָ֔ה <WH2389> And in all that mighty וּלְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> and for all הַמּוֹרָ֣א <WH4172> terror הַגָּד֑וֹל <WH1419> and in all the great אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which עָשָׂ֣ה <WH6213> shewed מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> which Moses לְעֵינֵ֖י <WH5869> in the sight כָּל־ <WH3605> of all יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of all Israel
